item.description:
If anyone is interested I have included a copy of the menu. Price is set and is as follows:

Cost of Dinner & Beer: $45 +tax & gratuity

Call today (860) 783-5545 or stop in to book your reservation. There currently is not set reservation as a group but if anyone is interested please feel free to call for a reservation!

*Sometimes they will substitute wine for beer, but you can always ask when making your reservation.*
item.how_to_find_us: Call me 203-768-8561 or Colleen @ 203-538-5544 or since its a small room I'm sure we will see each other.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Sam Adams Beer dinner at CW Chops
